article_title: Seattle Area Biz Tacks 'Living Wage Surcharge' Onto Receipts In Response To $15

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Simple economics: as costs go up, so do prices. We know this. When weather damaged crops last year, you saw it at the grocery store. When gas costs edged up, so did delivery fees. And as the price of beef has crept up, so have the costs of many items on [...]
